title: Possibility of providing separate credentials for logging in to Hyper-v virtual machine
author: Wolvverine
body_snippet:
It would be useful to add the possibility of providing separate credentials for logging in to Hyper-v virtual machines.

Currently it is possible to give credentials only for Hyper-v server - there is no possibility to give separate credentials for logging in to the virtual machine itself if they are different for the RDP session than for the Hyper-v server.

mRemoteNG - v1.77.3
